metadata.title: CVE-2014-2554 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OTRS 3.1.x before 3.1.21, 3.2.x before 3.2.16, and 3.3.x before 3.3.6allows remote attackers to conduct clickjacking attacks via an IFRAMEelement.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
